Rulings.Tengu:
●If you activate the effect of Nobleman-Eater Bug and select 2 monsters, then Ring of Destruction is chained and destroys 1 of the selected monsters, you still destroy the remaining monster when Nobleman-Eater Bug’s effect resolves.
●If Nobleman-Eater Bug is the only monster on the field and it is flipped face-up, then it destroys itself with its effect.

Rulings.Base: 1. If you activate the effect of "Nobleman-Eater Bug" and select 2 monsters, then "Ring of Destruction" is chained and destroys 1 of the selected monsters, you still destroy the remaining monster when the effect of "Nobleman-Eater Bug" resolves.\n2. If "Nobleman-Eater Bug" is the only monster on the field and it is flipped face-up, then it destroys itself with its effect.
